panels.title: INCIDENTS FOR THE GIVEN TIME RANGE

targets.rawSql:
select created_date as "time",
count(*)
from incidents_incident
where    $__timeFilter(created_date)
GROUP BY current_status

select created_date as "time",
count(*)
from incidents_incident
where  current_status = 'NEW' and  $__timeFilter(created_date)
GROUP BY current_status

select
count(*) as value
from incidents_incident
where 
(current_status = 'ACTION_TAKEN' or  
current_status = 'ACTION_PENDING' or 
current_status = 'ADVICE_PROVIDED' or 
current_status = 'ADVICE_REQESTED' or
current_status = 'VERIFIED' ) and 
$__timeFilter(created_date)

-- GROUP BY id

select created_date as "time",
count(*)
from incidents_incident
where (current_status = 'CLOSED' || current_status =  'INVALIDATED') and $__timeFilter(created_date)
GROUP BY current_status

select T.Total - ( T.VERIFIED + T.NEW + T.INVALIDATED + T.CLOSED + T.ADVICE_REQESTED + T.ACTION_TAKEN + T.ACTION_PENDING ) as val
from
(select   created_date as "time", 
 sum(( CASE WHEN  current_status  = 'VERIFIED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ) As 'VERIFIED',
SUM(( CASE WHEN current_status = 'NEW' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )) AS 'NEW',
SUM( CASE WHEN current_status = 'INVALIDATED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS 'INVALIDATED',
SUM( CASE WHEN current_status = 'CLOSED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS 'CLOSED',
SUM( CASE WHEN current_status = 'ADVICE_REQESTED' THEN 1 ELSE 0  END ) AS 'ADVICE_REQESTED',
SUM( CASE WHEN current_status = 'ACTION_TAKEN' THEN 1 ELSE 0  END ) AS 'ACTION_TAKEN',
SUM( CASE WHEN current_status = 'ACTION_PENDING' THEN 1 ELSE 0  END ) AS 'ACTION_PENDING', 
SUM( CASE WHEN current_status = 'ADVICE_PROVIDED' THEN 1 ELSE 0  END ) AS 'ADVICE_PROVIDED',
count(*) as 'Total' 
from incidents_incident where $__timeFilter(created_date) ) as T 


-- from incidents_incident
-- where (current_status is null || category = '') and $__timeFilter(created_date)
-- where (current_status != 'VERIFIED' || current_status != 'NEW' || current_status != 'INVALIDATED' || current_status != 'CLOSED' || current_status != 'ADVICE_REQESTED' || current_status != 'ACTION_TAKEN' || current_status != 'ACTION_PENDING') and $__timeFilter(created_date)
-- GROUP BY current_status

-- select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_time) AS time_sec,subcategory as metric, no_of_incidnets as value
-- from (select date_time,
--             category,
--             subcategory,
--             count(id) as no_of_incidnets
--       from real_data
--       where category = '$category'
--       group by subcategory
--       order by no_of_incidnets desc,subcategory desc) a
-- where $__timeFilter(date_time) and (no_of_incidnets*100/'$total_incidents')>'$threshold'   and category = '$category'
-- group by metric
-- order by value desc, subcategory desc



-- select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_time) AS time_sec,subcategory as metric, no_of_incidnets as value
-- from (select date_time,
--             category,
--             subcategory,
--             count(id) as no_of_incidnets
--       from real_data
      
--       group by subcategory
--       order by no_of_incidnets desc,subcategory desc) a
-- where $__timeFilter(date_time)   
-- group by metric
-- order by value desc, subcategory desc limit 5



SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(incidents_incident.created_date) AS time_sec, CONCAT( code,' | ',sub_category) as metric,count(incidents_incident.id) as value
from incidents_incident INNER JOIN common_category ON
common_category.id = incidents_incident.category
where
  $__timeFilter(incidents_incident.created_date) and 
  common_category.top_category="Violation of election law"
GROUP by code
order by value desc, code 
limit 5

panels.title: VIOLATION OF ELECTION LAW: TOP 5 SUBCATEGORIES

targets.rawSql:
-- select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_time) AS time_sec,subcategory as metric, no_of_incidnets as value
-- from (select date_time,
--             category,
--             subcategory,
--             count(id) as no_of_incidnets
--       from real_data
--       where category = '$category'
--       group by subcategory
--       order by no_of_incidnets desc,subcategory desc) a
-- where $__timeFilter(date_time) and (no_of_incidnets*100/'$total_incidents')>'$threshold'   and category = '$category'
-- group by metric
-- order by value desc, subcategory desc



-- select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_time) AS time_sec,subcategory as metric, no_of_incidnets as value
-- from (select date_time,
--             category,
--             subcategory,
--             count(id) as no_of_incidnets
--       from real_data
      
--       group by subcategory
--       order by no_of_incidnets desc,subcategory desc) a
-- where $__timeFilter(date_time)   
-- group by metric
-- order by value desc, subcategory desc limit 5



SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(incidents_incident.created_date) AS time_sec, CONCAT( code,' | ',sub_category) as metric,count(incidents_incident.id) as value
from incidents_incident INNER JOIN common_category ON
common_category.id = incidents_incident.category
where
  $__timeFilter(incidents_incident.created_date) and 
  common_category.top_category="Violence"
GROUP by code
order by value desc, code 
limit 5

-- SELECT
--   $__timeGroupAlias(date_time,1m),
--   mode_of_recieve AS metric,
--   count(mode_of_recieve) AS "mode_of_recieve"
-- FROM real_data 
-- WHERE
--   $__timeFilter(date_time)
-- GROUP BY 1,2


SELECT
  $__timeFilter(date_time) as time_sec,
  mode_of_recieve AS metric,
  count(mode_of_recieve) AS "mode_of_recieve"
FROM (select occured_date  as date_time , common_channel.name as mode_of_recieve from incidents_incident inner join common_channel on incidents_incident.infoChannel = common_channel.id where
  $__timeFilter(occured_date)) as real_data
GROUP BY 1,2

select
UNIX_TIMESTAMP(occured_date) as time_sec,
count(id),'Low (1-3)' as metric
from 
incidents_incident as ins
where
  $__timeFilter(occured_date) and  severity<4
group by id

select
UNIX_TIMESTAMP(occured_date) as time_sec,
count(id),'Medium (4-7)' as metric
from 
incidents_incident as ins
where
  $__timeFilter(occured_date) and  severity>3 and severity<8
group by id

select
UNIX_TIMESTAMP(occured_date) as time_sec,
count(id),'High (8-10)' as metric
from 
incidents_incident as ins
where
  $__timeFilter(occured_date) and  severity>7
group by id

panels.title: NO. OF INCIDENTS BY SEVERITY LEVEL

targets.rawSql:
SELECT now() as 'time',
count(incidents_incident.id) 
from incidents_incident INNER JOIN common_category ON
common_category.id = incidents_incident.category
where
  $__timeFilter(incidents_incident.created_date) and incidents_incident.category = NULL -- OR incidents_incident.category =""
  -- and common_category.top_category="NULL"
-- GROUP by sub_category

select now() as 'time',count(*) as value
--   count(CASE WHEN current_status != 'RESOLVED' then 'Unresolved' end) as Unresolved,
from incidents_incident
where 
  ( category is null or category = '' )
  AND 
  $__timeFilter(created_date)

panels.title: INCIDENTS ASSIGNED TO THE POLICE STATION FOR THE GIVEN TIME RANGE

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(eew.is_action_completed) as value,
eew.created_date as 'time'

 FROM incidents_escalateexternalworkflow eew
 inner join incidents_incident ins on ins.id = eew.incident_id
 inner join auth_user au on au.id = eew.escalated_user_id
 inner join auth_group ag on ag.id = au.id 
 inner join auth_user_groups aug on au.id = aug.group_id 
  where aug.group_id  in (2,8,9 ) and $__timeFilter(eew.created_date)

SELECT 
sum(( CASE WHEN  eew.is_action_completed  = '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ) As value, eew.created_date as 'time'

  FROM incidents_escalateexternalworkflow eew
 inner join incidents_incident ins on ins.id = eew.incident_id
 inner join auth_user au on au.id = eew.escalated_user_id
 inner join auth_group ag on ag.id = au.id 
 inner join auth_user_groups aug on au.id = aug.group_id 
  where aug.group_id  in (2,8,9 ) and $__timeFilter(eew.created_date)

SELECT 
sum(( CASE WHEN  eew.is_action_completed  = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ) As value,
eew.created_date as 'time'
 FROM incidents_escalateexternalworkflow eew
 inner join incidents_incident ins on ins.id = eew.incident_id
 inner join auth_user au on au.id = eew.escalated_user_id
 inner join auth_group ag on ag.id = au.id 
 inner join auth_user_groups aug on au.id = aug.group_id 
  where aug.group_id  in (2,8,9 ) and $__timeFilter(eew.created_date)

SELECT SUM(T1.Tot-T1.Police) AS Others , T1.Police , now() as 'time' FROM (
 Select ((SELECT count(eew.is_action_completed) as value

 FROM incidents_escalateexternalworkflow eew
 inner join incidents_incident ins on ins.id = eew.incident_id
 inner join auth_user au on au.id = eew.escalated_user_id
 inner join auth_group ag on ag.id = au.id  -- and ag.id = 2
 inner join auth_user_groups aug on au.id = aug.group_id  -- and aug.group_id = 2
 -- inner join auth_group ag on ag.id = aug.group_id = 2
  where aug.group_id  in (2,8,9 )  and $__timeFilter(eew.created_date) ))as Police,
  
 (select count(*) 
 from incidents_incident
 where current_status != 'NULL' and $__timeFilter(created_date)) as Tot ) AS T1

panels.title: ALL TIME ASSIGNED TO THE POLICE STATION

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(eew.is_action_completed) as value

 FROM incidents_escalateexternalworkflow eew
 inner join incidents_incident ins on ins.id = eew.incident_id
 inner join auth_user au on au.id = eew.escalated_user_id
 inner join auth_group ag on ag.id = au.id  -- and ag.id = 2
 inner join auth_user_groups aug on au.id = aug.group_id  -- and aug.group_id = 2
 -- inner join auth_group ag on ag.id = aug.group_id = 2
  where aug.group_id  in (2,8,9 )

SELECT 
sum(( CASE WHEN  eew.is_action_completed  = '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ) As value

 FROM incidents_escalateexternalworkflow eew
 inner join incidents_incident ins on ins.id = eew.incident_id
 inner join auth_user au on au.id = eew.escalated_user_id
 inner join auth_group ag on ag.id = au.id  -- and ag.id = 2
 inner join auth_user_groups aug on au.id = aug.group_id  -- and aug.group_id = 2
 -- inner join auth_group ag on ag.id = aug.group_id = 2
  where aug.group_id  in (2,8,9 )

SELECT 
sum(( CASE WHEN  eew.is_action_completed  = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ) As value

 FROM incidents_escalateexternalworkflow eew
 inner join incidents_incident ins on ins.id = eew.incident_id
 inner join auth_user au on au.id = eew.escalated_user_id
 inner join auth_group ag on ag.id = au.id  -- and ag.id = 2
 inner join auth_user_groups aug on au.id = aug.group_id  -- and aug.group_id = 2
 -- inner join auth_group ag on ag.id = aug.group_id = 2
  where aug.group_id  in (2,8,9 )

SELECT SUM(T1.Tot-T1.Police) AS Others , T1.Police , now() as 'time' FROM (
 Select ((SELECT count(eew.is_action_completed) as value

 FROM incidents_escalateexternalworkflow eew
 inner join incidents_incident ins on ins.id = eew.incident_id
 inner join auth_user au on au.id = eew.escalated_user_id
 inner join auth_group ag on ag.id = au.id  -- and ag.id = 2
 inner join auth_user_groups aug on au.id = aug.group_id  -- and aug.group_id = 2
 -- inner join auth_group ag on ag.id = aug.group_id = 2
  where aug.group_id  in (2,8,9 )  and $__timeFilter(eew.created_date) ))as Police,
  
 (select count(*) 
 from incidents_incident
 where current_status != 'NULL' -- and $__timeFilter(created_date)
 ) as Tot ) AS T1

select count(*) as val
from incidents_incident

select count(*) as val
from incidents_incident
where  current_status = 'NEW'
GROUP BY current_status

select count(*) as value
from incidents_incident
where 
(current_status = 'ACTION_TAKEN' or  
current_status = 'ACTION_PENDING' or 
current_status = 'ADVICE_PROVIDED' or 
current_status = 'ADVICE_REQESTED' or
current_status = 'VERIFIED' )

select count(*)
from incidents_incident
where (current_status = 'CLOSED' || current_status =  'INVALIDATED')
-- GROUP BY current_status

select T.Total - ( T.VERIFIED + T.NEW + T.INVALIDATED + T.CLOSED + T.ADVICE_REQESTED + T.ACTION_TAKEN + T.ACTION_PENDING ) as val
from
(select   created_date as "time", 
 sum(( CASE WHEN  current_status  = 'VERIFIED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ) As 'VERIFIED',
SUM(( CASE WHEN current_status = 'NEW' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )) AS 'NEW',
SUM( CASE WHEN current_status = 'INVALIDATED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS 'INVALIDATED',
SUM( CASE WHEN current_status = 'CLOSED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS 'CLOSED',
SUM( CASE WHEN current_status = 'ADVICE_REQESTED' THEN 1 ELSE 0  END ) AS 'ADVICE_REQESTED',
SUM( CASE WHEN current_status = 'ACTION_TAKEN' THEN 1 ELSE 0  END ) AS 'ACTION_TAKEN',
SUM( CASE WHEN current_status = 'ACTION_PENDING' THEN 1 ELSE 0  END ) AS 'ACTION_PENDING', 
SUM( CASE WHEN current_status = 'ADVICE_PROVIDED' THEN 1 ELSE 0  END ) AS 'ADVICE_PROVIDED',
count(*) as 'Total' 
from incidents_incident ) as T
